author: timbasurf
title: The DAO of Trailer Parks
description: Trailer owners can be evicted with minimal compensation when retiring park owners seek a fair exit. Global multi B$ issue harms rural poor.
solution: A simple planning DAO to attract collective blockchain intelligence to deliver the best mutually possible outcomes for all stakeholders.
experience: Elec Eng w 32 year side hustle as a park owner & now making a fair exit. Tech entrepreneur. linkedin.com/in/dave-dingle-0544811
